divs: Sighting DetailsMy Dad saw three bright red lights that formed a triangle hovering South San Jose, CA last night around 8:50-9:00 PM while he was outside locking his truck up for the night. He called my house and told me to run outside and look up in the sky towards his place. I am about 6-7 miles from his place. I couldn't see anything, but he was still watching it while I was on the phone with him. I would say the event lasted 5+ minutes until he lost sight of the lights. I am not sure what he witnessed, but it looks like people in other states witnessed something similar last night.
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in San Jose
There were no other sightings in San Jose on or around May 11th 2012
Summary: 3 bright red lights in a triangle shape hovering over South San Jose last night.
